summary: Hari Traders menswear e-commerce site focusing on branded shoes (Adidas, Nike, Puma, Asian, etc.)
architectural_notes: Product catalog focuses on men's branded footwear
Multi-brand inventory: Adidas, Nike, Puma, Asian, and other brands
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Men's Adidas sneaker product photo on white background (adidas-mens-shoe.dim_800x600.png)
- Men's Nike athletic shoe product photo on white background (nike-mens-shoe.dim_800x600.png)
- Men's Puma sports shoe product photo on white background (puma-mens-shoe.dim_800x600.png)
- Men's Asian brand casual shoe product photo on white background (asian-mens-shoe.dim_800x600.png)
- Men's branded formal or casual shoe from another brand on white background (other-brand-mens-shoe.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Replace all shoe gallery images with men's footwear from major brands including Adidas, Nike, Puma, and Asian
Update shoe product titles and descriptions to match the new men's branded footwear images

new_feature_requests.summary: Change shoe images to men's wear only with brands: Adidas, Nike, Puma, Asian, and other brands
